T02D2264:28b-1: do ha ko sha au pa de sha g'i ti n'a ma /
T02D2264:28b-3: mi zad pa'i gter mdzod man ngag gi glu zhes bya ba /
T02D2264:28b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2264:28b-5: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad //
T02D2264:28b-6: gnyis med rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i gnas //
T02D2264:28b-7: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun de rang bzhin //
T02D2264:29a-0: @29a * // byang chub sems dpa' bde ba'i mgon po la //
T02D2264:29a-1: phyag bzang po yis btud de bshad par bya //
T02D2264:29a-2: skye bo srid pa'i 'khri shing lta bus bkris pa rnams //
T02D2264:29a-3: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mya ngan thang la rab tu skams //
T02D2264:29a-4: rgyal bu gzhon nu srid med pha dang bral ba bzhin //
T02D2264:29a-5: bde ba'i go skabs med pas sems la zug rdur gyur //
T02D2264:29a-6: dpyad pas ma 'ongs de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ni //
T02D2264:29a-7: byas pa rnams dang bral zhing bsags pa'i las min zhes //
T02D2264:29a-8: rang nyid shes pa'i mda' bsnun gyis ni de skad smras //
T02D2264:29a-9: mkhas pa thams cad snying la dug gis khyab par gyur //
T02D2264:29a-10: sems nyid rnal ma'i don ni kun gyis rtogs dka' ba //
T02D2264:29a-11: mtha' yis ma gos dri ma med pa'i snying po ni //
T02D2264:29a-12: rang bzhin gdod nas rnam pa kun gyi dpyad bya min //
T02D2264:29a-13: gal te dpyad na dug sbrul gtses pa kho nar zad //
T02D2264:29a-14: blo yis gzhag pa'i chos 'di thams cad rang gis stong //
T02D2264:29a-15: rkyen dang bral phyir brtag pa thams cad yod ma yin //
T02D2264:29a-16: rang bzhin gnas su grol ba'i de bzhin nyid shes na //
T02D2264:29a-17: mthong thos la sogs med cing de yis mi mthun bral //
T02D2264:29a-18: dngos por rtog pa thams cad phyugs dang 'dra bar brjod //
T02D2264:29a-19: dngos med rtog pa de bas shin du blun 'gyur zhes //
T02D2264:29a-20: mar me 'bar dang bsad pa'i dpe yis brjod pa
T02D2264:29a-21: dag / gnyis med rang bzhin phyag rgya chen por
T02D2264:29a-22: gnas // dngos por skyes pa dngos po med par rab zhi zhing //
T02D2264:29a-23: de yi phyogs dang bral ba mkhas pa de nyid ni //
T02D2264:29a-24: blun po rnams kyi blo la rang gis dpyad byas na //
T02D2264:29a-25: skad cig grol ba de la chos kyi sku zhes bya //
T02D2264:29a-26: grol ba de las gzhan pa'i bde chen sa yod ces //
T02D2264:29a-27: byis pa rnams kyis smras kyang smig rgyu'i chu dang mtshungs //
T02D2264:29a-28: sa dang lam dang sangs rgyas thams cad go gcig pa'i //
T02D2264:29a-29: gnyug ma'i ye shes 'di nyid yin gyi yid la dris ;
T02D2264:29a-30: / da ltar rtogs pa'i mi de la ni 'ching ba med //
T02D2264:29a-31: rdul ma spangs shing rdul gyis cung zad gos pa med //
T02D2264:29a-32: nyon mongs gnyen po gnyis su 'byed pa ga la yod //
T02D2264:29a-33: de ltar brtson pa'i skyes bu de ni 'khor bar 'ching //
T02D2264:29a-34: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' rnams //
T02D2264:29b-0: lhan @29b cig skyes pa'i ro gcig las ni gzhan yod min //
T02D2264:29b-1: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa gnyis su mi rtogs pa //
T02D2264:29b-2: 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas lugs yin par bshad //
T02D2264:29b-3: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad //
T02D2264:29b-4: kye ma rang la rang gis de nyid mtshon te ltos //
T02D2264:29b-5: ma yengs pa yi sems kyis lta dang bral gyur na //
T02D2264:29b-6: yengs pa'i sems kyis de nyid rtogs par mi 'gyur te //
T02D2264:29b-7: dngos po'i tshang tshing gseb tu de nyid nor bu stor //
T02D2264:29b-8: kye ma 'dod pa'i dngos po gang la'ang khyod nyid chags ma byed //
T02D2264:29b-9: gal te chags par bya ba'i yul la yid chags na //
T02D2264:29b-10: 'di ni bde chen sems mchog gzir ba'i nad rab ste //
T02D2264:29b-11: dri ma med pa'i sems la 'dod pa'i mtshon gyis btab //
T02D2264:29b-12: kye ma rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su ma lta
T02D2264:29b-13: cig / dngos por skye ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu
T02D2264:29b-14: yod min te // re dang dogs pa'i dug gis rnal 'byor sems myos na //
T02D2264:29b-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gnas de 'ching bar 'gyur //
T02D2264:29b-16: kye ma rang bzhin bral ba'i de nyid bsgom du yod ma zer //
T02D2264:29b-17: gal te bsgom par bya dang sgom byed gnyis rtogs na //
T02D2264:29b-18: gnyis su 'dzin pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems spangs te //
T02D2264:29b-19: skyes bu de yis rang gis rang la sdig pa byas //
T02D2264:29b-20: kye ma bla ma'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi'i thigs pa ji snyed pa //
T02D2264:29b-21: nges shes sngon 'gro pa yis rab tu blang bar bya //
T02D2264:29b-22: dus dang thabs la mkhas pas dus su ma bsten na //
T02D2264:29b-23: long bas rgyal po'i bang mdzod rku dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
T02D2264:29b-24: kye ma rin chen dbang dang bral pa'i skyes bu ni //
T02D2264:29b-25: gdol pa dman pa zhig gis rgyal por re smon bzhin //
T02D2264:29b-26: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyud rnams der bslus pas //
T02D2264:29b-27: mkha' 'gros chad pa bcad nas rdo rje'i dmyal bar ltung //
T02D2264:29b-28: kye ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag las mchog gi don blangs nas //
T02D2264:29b-29: dam par mi 'dzin dman pa'i sems kyis yongs spong ba //
T02D2264:29b-30: skye bo rab rib gzeb kyis khyer bar gyur pa na //
T02D2264:29b-31: bskal pa chen por rang la sdug bsngal byas par zad //
T02D2264:29b-32: kye ma brtan pa'i sa la phyin nas dam tshig mi ldan na //
T02D2264:29b-33: rgyal pos chad pa gcod pa'i mi ni bzung ba ltar //
T02D2264:30a-1: smin lcags kyus srog gi rlung gi bzung byas nas //
T02D2264:30a-2: khro chu khol ma khar blugs pa ni bzod par dka' //
T02D2264:30a-3: kye ma gnas lugs rtogs kyang dman pa'i spyod pa nyid byed na //
T02D2264:30a-4: rgyal po khri las bab nas phyag dar byed pa bzhin //
T02D2264:30a-5: zad mi shes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid spangs nas //
T02D2264:30a-6: 'khor ba'i bde ba dag la reg pa nyid kyis 'ching //
T02D2264:30a-7: kye ma spros pa rnams dang bral ba'i rang gi sems mthong nas //
T02D2264:30a-8: spros pa rnams la ched du 'bad pa'i rnal 'byor ni //
T02D2264:30a-9: nor bu rin chen rnyed nas 'ching bu tshol ba bzhin //
T02D2264:30a-10: 'bad pa byas kyang snying po'i sa ni nam yang min //
T02D2264:30a-11: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad //
T02D2264:30a-12: byang chub sems zin pa dang byang chub sems rtogs dang //
T02D2264:30a-13: 'bad pa dang bcas 'bad pa bral ba'i ye shes ni //
T02D2264:30a-14: dam pa rnams kyi zhal gyi bdud rtsi las byung ba //
T02D2264:30a-15: nyi ma zla ba gnyis kyi dbus su gsal bar byed //
T02D2264:30a-16: tshad dang ldan pa'i skyes bu'i sna rtse las byung zhing //
T02D2264:30a-17: mtshan dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya las ni de sems
T02D2264:30a-18: gcig / gzugs sogs dngos po'i chos rnams de yis
T02D2264:30a-19: mdog bsgyur nas // zhi ba dang bcas man ngag gis ni shes par bya //
T02D2264:30a-20: 'od gsal ba yi chos nyid de ni nges mthong nas ;
T02D2264:30a-21: / bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa de ni cher rtogs la //
T02D2264:30a-22: shes rab pha rol phyin dang mdo gzhan las rnyed cing //
T02D2264:30a-23: kun la sbyar ba'i sems ni rab tu bsgom par bya //
T02D2264:30a-24: phyi dang nang du blta ba med pa'i sems de ni //
T02D2264:30a-25: gang gis mi bsam gang la yang ni sems ma yin //
T02D2264:30a-26: rang bzhin gnas pa rdo rje rtse mor glu blangs pa //
T02D2264:30a-27: bde chen gzab gtad bral ba chu bo lta bur bsgom //
T02D2264:30a-28: 'dus pa'i tshogs su spros pa kun gyis g-yengs pa'i sems //
T02D2264:30a-29: 'pho dang 'jug pa med pa'i rang bzhin brtan pa nyid //
T02D2264:30a-30: sems kyi snying po rang dga' bar ni legs btang ste //
T02D2264:30a-31: smyon pa lta bu'i sems ni bya ba dang bral ba //
T02D2264:30a-32: mtha' yis ma gos ye shes de ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2264:30a-33: sgom dang bsgom bya med pa'i sems ni rang bzhin bral //
T02D2264:30a-34: re dogs med pa'i mthar thug pa ni rdo rje'i sems //
T02D2264:30a-35: dmyal bar song srid na yang de la sdug bsngal med //
T02D2264:30b-0: srid dang 'bras @30b bu mchog la gnas kyang lhag pa rnyed min pas //
T02D2264:30b-1: bde dang sdug bsngal gnyis kyis phan dang gnod spangs nas //
T02D2264:30b-2: bzang dang ngan pa'i spyod pas de la 'phel 'grib med //
T02D2264:30b-3: rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis bral 'di las ma gtogs pa //
T02D2264:30b-4: sangs rgyas che bar 'dod na rmongs par shes par bya //
T02D2264:30b-5: bya ba med pa'i yid kyis gang yang ma btsal na //
T02D2264:30b-6: yon tan btsal mi dgos shing de yi mi mthun bral //
T02D2264:30b-7: rgyu dang bstan bcos kun las de nyid rnyed min pas //
T02D2264:30b-8: zhe 'dod med pa'i sems la rgyu yi dri ma bral //
T02D2264:30b-9: gang du'ang ma lta ye shes chen po nyid myong ba //
T02D2264:30b-10: 'khor ba'i dug rnams zhi bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2264:30b-11: dge slong gzhu 'dra rgyal srid kun la dbang sgyur byed //
T02D2264:30b-12: mig ni mi 'dzums bsgom du med pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2264:30b-13: dben pa'i gnas dang gnas mal med pa'i gnas nyid du //
T02D2264:30b-14: chags dang sdang ba spangs pa'i dri ma med pa'i yid //
T02D2264:30b-15: don dam sems kyi ngo bo de ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2264:30b-16: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad //
T02D2264:30b-17: dkyil 'khor ba dang sbyin sreg pas stong zhing //
T02D2264:30b-18: sngangs dang phyag rgya rab gnas la sogs rnam bral ba //
T02D2264:30b-19: rgyud dang bstan bcos kun gyi bsgrub par mi nus pa'i //
T02D2264:30b-20: rdo rje ye shes 'di ni rang bzhin gnas na mdzes //
T02D2264:30b-21: gcig gis go bar nus pa rin chen brda yi
T02D2264:30b-22: mchog / sbrul gyi gzeb ltar gzhan la mdzes pa
T02D2264:30b-23: yod ma yin // snying pos snying po mtshon pa bla ma mchog dag las //
T02D2264:30b-24: rtogs pas gzhan la mtshon te de nyid rang la mtshon//
T02D2264:30b-25: nam mkha' nor bu nyi ma lta bu'i mthu mnga' ba //
T02D2264:30b-26: thig le gsum dang yid dran pa dang dran med dang //
T02D2264:30b-27: sbyor ba'i sgra sogs gang la'ang spyod par nus rud pa'i //
T02D2264:30b-28: gser 'gyur rtsi ltar chos rnams thams cad ro mnyam 'gyur //
T02D2264:30b-29: lam sbyang ba la gnyug mi'i ye shes gcig pu gcig /
T02D2264:30b-30: lam nyid brdas ston pa ni bla ma mchog dag la //
T02D2264:30b-31: gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang chos la brten par bya //
T02D2264:30b-32: chos rnams thams cad rkyen med par ni skye ma yin //
T02D2264:30b-33: ma skyes pa la mkhas pa'i skal ldan de dag gis //
T02D2264:30b-34: skyes pa thams cad la ni shugs kyis mkhas par 'gyur //
T02D2264:31a-0: @31a * // tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kho na gcig pu nyid //
T02D2264:31a-1: rang bzhin gzhag pa'i sems kyis rang la khyab par 'gyur //
T02D2264:31a-2: bdag dang gzhan du snang ba'i rang bzhin gcig shes shing //
T02D2264:31a-3: de nyid kho na ma yengs pa yis yongs bzung ste //
T02D2264:31a-4: de nyid sems kyi zug rdu yin phyir btang nas kyang //
T02D2264:31a-5: gang la'ang zhan pa med pas bde ba len par byed //
T02D2264:31a-6: sems la gnod pa'i las ni thams cad kyis stong zhing //
T02D2264:31a-7: rnyed dang len pa'i bya ba gang gis gos pa med //
T02D2264:31a-8: rtsol dang bral zhing gnas skabs glo bur rkyen med par //
T02D2264:31a-9: snang ba sna tshogs phyag rgya 'di ni gzigs mor che //
T02D2264:31a-10: thams cad thams cad dam pa'i dus su nyer mthong nas //
T02D2264:31a-11: bla mar ma gyur chos ni gang yang yod ma yin //
T02D2264:31a-12: bar snang mdzub mos mtshon pas bar snang mthong ba med //
T02D2264:31a-13: bla mas mtshon pa'i bla ma de yang de bzhin no //
T02D2264:31a-14: brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni grong khyer sems //
T02D2264:31a-15: rgyal po'i pho brang 'jug cing bu mo dang rtse yang //
T02D2264:31a-16: skyur ba sngar zos pa yis skyur ba mthong ba bzhin //
T02D2264:31a-17: yul rnams thams cad de bzhin nyid du rig /
T02D2264:31a-18: tshogs kyi 'khor lo nye bar brgyan pa'i gnas nyid
T02D2264:31a-19: du // kun du ru yi skabs su bde ba che mthong nas /
T02D2264:31a-20: brda dang dam tshig ldan pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis ni //
T02D2264:31a-21: srid dang zhi ba mnyam pa nyid legs phyag rgya che //
T02D2264:31a-22: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad //
T02D2264:31a-23: ye shes skyes pa'i rnal 'byor gang la'ang dogs med pas //
T02D2264:31a-24: dbang phyug thabs dang ldan pas mthar skyes btsal bar bya //
T02D2264:31a-25: dman pa'i grong khyer zhugs nas gang dang mthun pa la //
T02D2264:31a-26: chung ngu chung dus brid cing chen po de la sbyin //
T02D2264:31a-27: de yis bsnyen bskur byas pa'i rdzas ni ji snyed pa //
T02D2264:31a-28: bdag gir med pa'i sems kyis de la gtad par bya //
T02D2264:31a-29: kun du 'khyam zhing mtshan ma rab tu brtag bya ste//
T02D2264:31a-30: regs dang kha dog mtshan ma'i tshogs kyis rim shes bya //
T02D2264:31a-31: rang gi bu mo ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang //
T02D2264:31a-32: g-yung mo tshos ma smad 'tshong gso ras kyis 'tsho ba //
T02D2264:31a-33: sngo bsangs dang ni dkar sham dmar ser smug nag ma //
T02D2264:31a-34: sme ba can la rgyud sbyar sla ba'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2264:31b-0: bcu drug lo lon @31b rab tu mdzes pa skra ser li //
T02D2264:31b-1: autpala la yi dris khyab nu ma sra mkhregs rked pa phra //
T02D2264:31b-2: smad kyi zheng rgyas bha ga rub cing chags pa'i mdangs //
T02D2264:31b-3: rkyang ma dang bcas gsang thub gus pas rab tu gzhol //
T02D2264:31b-4: dad pa rab tu brtan zhing rtog pa chung gyur pa //
T02D2264:31b-5: rtags gsum ldan pa'i phyag rgya dbang gis smin par bya //
T02D2264:31b-6: yon tan bzung na rang gis rig pa'i ye shes sbyin //
T02D2264:31b-7: skabs su ro snyoms gnyug ma'i ye shes phyag rgya bzung //
T02D2264:31b-8: btsun mo'i shu kra dgug pa'i phyag rgya chen mo ni //
T02D2264:31b-9: dus kyis bsdu ba byas nas rtog med mkha' la bstim //
T02D2264:31b-10: res 'ga' tshong dus gnas na ji ltar 'dug /
T02D2264:31b-11: don gyis don la bltas nas don nyid gar dgar btang //
T02D2264:31b-12: res 'ga' dur khrod zhugs nas sgron ma dag la spyod //
T02D2264:31b-13: nyam nga med pa'i sems kyis yi dags gnas su nyal //
T02D2264:31b-14: gdol pa rnams dang 'grogs te ro yi 'khor lo drang //
T02D2264:31b-15: 'di bya med pa'i spyod pa tshad du gzung mi bya //
T02D2264:31b-16: glu gar gling bu rtsed 'jo rol mo'i tshogs su
T02D2264:31b-17: 'jug / he ru ka yi gar dang drug la
T02D2264:31b-18: skyes sogs glus // sems la gzengs bstod cung zad skyo bar mi bya'o //
T02D2264:31b-19: rgyab tu la ba bgo zhing yan lag zangs mas spras //
T02D2264:31b-20: 'khor lo ldan pa'i thor tshugs spyi gtsug dag tu gzung //
T02D2264:31b-21: rus pa'i dum bus yan lag kun la brgyan byas nas //
T02D2264:31b-22: glang chen stag gi pags pas stod dang smad dkris te //
T02D2264:31b-23: kha tv'am dril bur ldan pa lag tu thogs par bya //
T02D2264:31b-24: glang chen smyon pa'i spyod pa lkugs pa byas nas ni //
T02D2264:31b-25: bya med mi bya med pa'i spyod pa rang shugs kyis //
T02D2264:31b-26: glang chen mtsho ru zhugs 'dra rtag tu smyon sems kyis /
T02D2264:31b-27: dman pa'i chos rnams spyad na grol bar mda' bsnun smra //
T02D2264:31b-28: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad //
T02D2264:31b-29: sna tshogs chos rnams thams cad ro gcig par //
T02D2264:31b-30: ston par byed pa bla ma dam pa nyid yin te //
T02D2264:31b-31: ngang pa'i mchu dang mtshungs pa'i rje btsun mchog de ni //
T02D2264:31b-32: gus pa'i sems kyis gtsang ma'i spyi bor blang bar bya //
T02D2264:31b-33: gcig tu bsdus pa'i sems ni mtshon byed bla ma ste //
T02D2264:31b-34: mtshon par bya ba'i gzhi ni slob ma'i snying nyid do //
T02D2264:32a-1: yis sdug bsngal thams cad skad cig la //
T02D2264:32a-2: 'joms par byed pa'i dpa' bo de ni drin can pas //
T02D2264:32a-3: don la bltas nas byas pa drin du gzo ba'i phyir //
T02D2264:32a-4: sman pa'i rgyal po de ni rtag tu gzung bar bya //
T02D2264:32a-5: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zab cing rgya che las //
T02D2264:32a-6: sgrol ba'i gru mchog de ni gzhan med de //
T02D2264:32a-7: dam pa'i grul brten nas bde chen rnyed gyur pa'i //
T02D2264:32a-8: stobs chen gnyen pa de ni g-yo med kun gyis bkur //
T02D2264:32a-9: ye shes nyi ma lta bu'i 'od zer dag pa yis //
T02D2264:32a-10: ma rig rig par byed pa'i skyes bu mchog de ni //
T02D2264:32a-11: gser 'gyur rtsi ltar chos rnams thams cad bde bar sgyur mdzad pa'i //
T02D2264:32a-12: thabs la mkhas pa 'khor los sgyur rgyal rtag tu bsten //
T02D2264:32a-13: chu bo lta bu'i sems kyis gnyis lta zil gnon cing //
T02D2264:32a-14: gang yang ma spangs gos pa med pa'i ye shes ldan //
T02D2264:32a-15: blo ma bcos shing blo yi rnam pa gnas gyur pa //
T02D2264:32a-16: bla ma dam pa'i zhal gyi bdud rtsi las ni byung //
T02D2264:32a-17: sems dang sems las byung zhes tha snyad pa rnams kyis //
T02D2264:32a-18: brtag pa 'di ni rnal 'byor pa yi grogs rnams su //
T02D2264:32a-19: sgyur bar byed pa bla ma'i zhal gyi padmo ste //
T02D2264:32a-20: thams cad dge ba'i bshes su bsgyur ba de las byung //
T02D2264:32a-21: rgyud rnams kun du spras shing tha snyad kyis dben pa //
T02D2264:32a-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba sus kyang shes mi 'gyur //
T02D2264:32a-23: man ngag mig gis mthong zhing dbang ba'i ros khyab pa //
T02D2264:32a-24: zhabs kyi rdul la reg na ye shes rig par 'gyur //
T02D2264:32a-25: sna tshogs dngos po'i chos la stong pa'i mda' 'phen dang //
T02D2264:32a-26: stong ba snang ba'i thabs kyis myong bar 'gyur byed pa //
T02D2264:32a-27: shes rab shes pas snang ba gzhal byar mthong ba ste //
T02D2264:32a-28: shes rab de ni bla med slob dpon dag las 'byung //
T02D2264:32a-29: nyon mongs thams cad thabs kyis mchog tu sgyur byed dang //
T02D2264:32a-30: rtog pa'i zug rdu gang gis sgyur bar mi nus pa //
T02D2264:32a-31: 'di ni man ngag snying po las ni nges 'byung dang //
T02D2264:32a-32: de yang rje btsun mthu las nges par rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D2264:32a-33: de phyir rgyud par ldan pa'i byin rlabs gang ldan pa //
T02D2264:32b-0: dus @32b thabs bsten pa mkhas pas rtag tu bsten par bya //
T02D2264:32b-1: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad //
T02D2264:32b-2: thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas //
T02D2264:32b-3: 'od gsal las ni lhan cig skyes pa rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D2264:32b-4: zla ba rgyas 'dra ba ni goms pa las byung ste //
T02D2264:32b-5: gsal bar byed pa s'a lu nyi zla'i 'od 'drar spyod //
T02D2264:32b-6: dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba rdo rje slob dpon yin //
T02D2264:32b-7: legs par sbyangs pa rgyu nyid 'bras bu kun gyi lus //
T02D2264:32b-8: bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2264:32b-9: byang chub sems dpa' bde ba'i mgon pos legs gsungs pa //
T02D2264:32b-10: chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku //
T02D2264:32b-11: ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni rgyu 'bras rab shes bya //
T02D2264:32b-12: sgro skur gnyis kyis stong pa gnyis med chos yin te //
T02D2264:32b-13: ngo bo nyid kyi bde ba de ni longs spyod che //
T02D2264:32b-14: sna tshogs pa yis 'gro ba thams cad sprul pa las //
T02D2264:32b-15: dbyer med ye shes nyid ni kun gyi bdag //
T02D2264:32b-16: skyed par bya dang byed pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs kyang //
T02D2264:32b-17: goms pa'i mthu yis dogs pa thams cad zil mnan nas //
T02D2264:32b-18: 'bras bu gnyis ni rang dang gzhan don phun tshogs yin //
T02D2264:32b-19: rgyu dang 'bras bur btags kyang ngo bo de dbyer med //
T02D2264:32b-20: smon lam snying rje'i stobs kyis gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'byung //
T02D2264:32b-21: bum pa bzang dang dpag bsam shing dang nor bu rin chen ltar //
T02D2264:32b-22: gang gis bzung ba med pa'i sku ni rab tu mdzes //
T02D2264:32b-23: gdul bya rnams la sna tshogs pa yi gzugs shar bas //
T02D2264:32b-24: de dag thams cad bsam mi khyab pa'i sprul pa ste //
T02D2264:32b-25: bsam du med pa'i ye shes rang byung gang bsgom pa //
T02D2264:32b-26: der ni 'bras bu ma lus bsgom par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2264:32b-27: theg pa chen po bla med snying po'i lam 'di ni //
T02D2264:32b-28: 'bras bu lam du khyer nas gdod nas 'bras bur gnas //
T02D2264:32b-29: gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa 'bras bu'i mchog yin te //
T02D2264:32b-30: sbyangs pa gtso bor gyur pa sogs las de ni 'byung //
T02D2264:32b-31: grol ba chen po las sbyangs re ba med pa'i sems //
T02D2264:32b-32: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i mthu las nges pa rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D2264:33a-1: chen gang la lha rdzas 'di skyes pas //
T02D2264:33a-2: gdug pa ma lus thams cad skad cig nyer zhi thim //
T02D2264:33a-3: seng+ge glang chen smyon dang stag dang dred mo dang //
T02D2264:33a-4: gcan zan khro bo dug sbrul me dang g-yang sa dang //
T02D2264:33a-5: rgyal po'i chad pa dug dang thog dang lce 'bab pa//
T02D2264:33a-6: thams cad ngo bo de nyid yin phyir gnod pa med //
T02D2264:33a-7: rnam rtog dgra chen choms pas dgra 'di thams cad choms //
T02D2264:33a-8: bdag lta'i gdug pa thul bas gdug pa thams cad thul //
T02D2264:33a-9: de phyir sems kyi nor bu 'di ni dam par byos //
T02D2264:33a-10: ae ma mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i skad //
T02D2264:33a-11: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gang rig pa //
T02D2264:33a-12: skyes bu de la gdug pa'i lkugs pa yod ma yin //
T02D2264:33a-13: las rnams gang la'ang dge dang sdig pa gnyis rtogs pa //
T02D2264:33a-14: gang zhig rtsol ba de ni gdug pa'i sbyor bar bshad //
T02D2264:33a-15: gang zag gis spyod de ni rang gis rang bcings pa'o //
T02D2264:33a-16: mos pa rgyun chags pa yi nad kyis 'khor bar ltung //
T02D2264:33a-17: rtog ges dgos pa med cing snga mas chog par zad //
T02D2264:33a-18: gang la dmigs kyang dmigs pa de yis thar pa sgrib //
T02D2264:33a-19: bzang por rtogs kyang de yi nad kyis 'khor bar ltung //
T02D2264:33a-20: dman pa'i las la brtag na rnam smin rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D2264:33a-21: brtag pa med pa'i sems ni nam mkha' lta bur gnas //
T02D2264:33a-22: nam mkha' gnas pa med pa de nyid tha snyad bral //
T02D2264:33a-23: bral ba'i sems la brtag dang dpyad pa mi dgos kyi //
T02D2264:33a-24: rang bzhin gzhag pa ji lta bu nyid de lta nyid //
T02D2264:33a-25: 'bras bu thogs pa med pa gdod nas rang la gnas //
T02D2264:33a-26: de phyir re dang dogs pa'i gnyen pos 'ching mi dgos //
T02D2264:33a-27: brda dang tha snyad btags pa kun kyang de bzhin te //
T02D2264:33a-28: yang dag ma yin yin pa mkhas pa kun gyi yul //
T02D2264:33a-29: rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med 'di ni snying po'i sems //
T02D2264:33a-30: de myong ba yi 'bad pas kun las btsal mi dgos //
T02D2264:33a-31: dam pa bsten dang nyen dang thos pa lhur len dang //
T02D2264:33a-32: yon tan dbang las 'byung zhes byin rlabs nod pa dang //
T02D2264:33a-33: ting 'dzin blor gzhag nas ni sbyor dang sgom pa dang //
T02D2264:33b-0: phan nges sngon du song nas brtul zhugs @33b gang spyod pa //
T02D2264:33b-1: de dag thams cad log rtog bcos ma la spyod yin //
T02D2264:33b-2: snying po'i sems ni skyon dang yon tan rnams dang bral //
T02D2264:33b-3: don de nyid ni bya ba gang yang mi dgos kyi //
T02D2264:33b-4: bya ba btang ba'i sems ni bde ba che mchog nyid //
T02D2264:33b-5: lnga rig la sogs zhe 'dod gdon gyis zin ;
T02D2264:33b-6: / dngos por 'dzin pa'i dug gis rang gi sems la khyab //
T02D2264:33b-7: phyi rol spangs pa'i sems ni nang du 'jog pa can //
T02D2264:33b-8: snying po la spyod rnams kyis 'di nyid bsam par rigs //
T02D2264:33b-9: rtog ge spros pa'i sbun pa phyir bsal nas //
T02D2264:33b-10: gnyug ma'i dbang po dag las skyes pa yi ;
T02D2264:33b-11: / don gyi snying po bla na med pa 'di //
T02D2264:33b-12: rtogs pas bcu bzhi'i sa la gnas par 'gyur //
T02D2264:33b-13: rnal 'byor ye shes chen po gang 'dod pa //
T02D2264:33b-14: rim dang cig car 'jug pa'i rim chos kyis //
T02D2264:33b-15: ye shes mchog gi go 'phang snying po rnams //
T02D2264:33b-16: bkod pas 'gro rnams phyag rgya che thob shog /
T02D2264:33b-17: snying po bla na med pa gtan la dbab pa
T02D2264:33b-18: do ha mdzod ces bya ba //
T02D2264:33b-19: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2264:33b-21: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra p'a ni dang /
